{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=DPC3825 |revision= |upc=746320981505 |asin=B0093N5XXO |fcc_date=11/18/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pegatron |manuf_model= |availability= |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=VUIUPWL6025 |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3380 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL064PIF |ram1=64 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QI-HCE6 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module=Pegatron UPWL6025 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43225;BCM43225KMLG, CA0917 P20, 917794 4; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_os=eCos |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:22:CE, 00:23:BE, 18:59:33, 7C:B2:1B |oui_eth=00:22:CE, 00:23:BE, 18:59:33, 7C:B2:1B }} {{TagLine|8x4 DOCSIS 3.0 Wireless Residential Gateway}} :[http://www.cisco.com/web/consumer/support/modem_DPC3825.html Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.cisco.com/web/consumer/support/userguides2/4021196_B.pdf Manual]
*8x4 DOCSIS 3.0<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }}
Per the manual, :"Note: The factory default Service Set Identifier (SSID) is either the last 6 :characters of CM MAC Address or SSID as identified on the product label"
===Links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/cisco/epc3825 On the '''OpenWrt Wiki'''] :"DPC3825 REV" and "PCB MADE IN CHINA" is silkscreened on the board. :It is stated this device is running '''eCos'''. :The bootloader seems to be a stripped down version of the Broadcom :bootloader for the BCM33XX called SA Bootloader. *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/cisco-dpc3825-docsis-30-wireless-residential-gateway-923 On '''SpeedGuide.net''']
